name: World of Warships: Legends — German Steel
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — German Steel
description:
Become a formidable opponent at sea by commanding the mighty German Fleet! In this bundle, you'll get German battleship Bayern with her permanent camo, German destroyer G-101, and a bunch of boosters to lift you on your path to victory.

This bundle contains: - Tier V battleship Bayern - Permanent camo for Bayern - Tier III destroyer G-101 - 7 days of Premium Account - 10x rare boosters of each type (50 in total) - 37,000 Commander XP
